text: WWE 2K Battlegrounds is a professional wrestling video game. It was developed by Saber Interactive and published by 2K Games. It was released on September 18, 2020, instead of 2K'S normal yearly WWE game. It uses Unreal Engine 4. title: WWE 2K Battlegrounds
